snippet: The ruling by the European Court of Human Rights does not oblige Ukraine’s judicial system to release former Prime Minister Yulia V. Tymoshenko.
abstract: European Court of Human Rights in Strasbourg, France, rules that 2011 arrest of former Ukrainian Prime Min Yulia V Tymoshenko on charges of abuse of power was illegal and politically motivated; ruling is first significant legal decision in Tymoshenko's favor, but does not oblige Ukraine to order her release.
lead_paragraph: The ruling by the European Court of Human Rights does not oblige Ukraine’s judicial system to release former Prime Minister Yulia V. Tymoshenko.

headline.seo: Tymoshenko, Ukraine’s Jailed Ex-Premier, Gets Decision in Her Favor
headline.main: Jailed Official in Ukraine Gets Decision in Her Favor
headline.print_headline: Ruling Favors Ex-Premier Who Is Jailed In Ukraine

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
